00025 #include "OgreBoxEmitter.h"
00026 #include "OgreParticle.h"
00027 #include "OgreException.h"
00028 #include "OgreStringConverter.h"
00029 
00030 
00031 
00032 namespace Ogre {
00033 
00034 
00035     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00036     BoxEmitter::BoxEmitter()
00037     {
00038         initDefaults("Box");
00039     }
00040     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00041     void BoxEmitter::_initParticle(Particle* pParticle)
00042     {
00043         Vector3 xOff, yOff, zOff;
00044 
00045         xOff = Math::SymmetricRandom() * mXRange;
00046         yOff = Math::SymmetricRandom() * mYRange;
00047         zOff = Math::SymmetricRandom() * mZRange;
00048 
00049         pParticle->mPosition = mPosition + xOff + yOff + zOff;
00050         
00051 
00052         // Generate complex data by reference
00053         genEmissionColour(pParticle->mColour);
00054         genEmissionDirection(pParticle->mDirection);
00055         genEmissionVelocity(pParticle->mDirection);
00056 
00057         // Generate simpler data
00058         pParticle->mTimeToLive = genEmissionTTL();
00059         
00060     }
00061 
00062 
00063 }
